For the purposes of this section, “non- traditional goods” means goods
other than black tea in bulk, crepe rubber, sheet rubber, scrap rubber,
coconut  oil,  desiccated  coconut  (other  than  desiccated  coconut
manufactured  by  using  continuous  scale  automated  process
technology and marketed with a quality guarantee), copra, fresh
coconuts, coconut fibre or such other commodity as may be specified
by the Minister by Notice published in the Gazette.
